prompt: Create a new List named 'Tech News' and add @TheVerge to it.
Enable dark mode via display settings.
Post a tweet about climate.
Bookmark a trending tweet and check if it appears in Bookmarks.
Mute notifications from @ElonMusk.
Create a poll with 'Yes' and 'No' options in a tweet.
Pin a tweet to my profile and confirm its visibility.
Send a direct message to @TwitterSupport.
Filter search results to show only 'News' under #AI.
Enable two-factor authentication via security settings.
Unfollow an inactive account using 'Following' list.
Quote-retweet a post with comment 'Interesting!'.
Switch to 'Latest tweets' timeline mode.
Turn off 'Location' tagging for new tweets.
Report a spam account and check confirmation.
Add a birthday to my profile info.
Use 'Advanced search' to find tweets from 2020.
Change tweet font size to 'Large' in settings.
Create a Twitter Moment with 5 selected tweets.
Block an account.
Turn on 'Quality filter' in notifications.
Set my location to New York for location-based trending topics.
Enable 'Protect my tweets' privacy setting.
Post a tweet with 3 hashtags.
Delete my oldest tweet from profile.
Join a Twitter Space via trending list.
Update email address in account settings.
Activate dark mode and adjust brightness settings.
Export account data via 'my Twitter data'.
Enable 'Hide sensitive content' in preferences.
Add a Twitter Circle with 3 users and post to it.
Use 'Topics' to follow 'Cryptocurrency'.
Customize profile color scheme to blue.
Disable autoplay for videos in settings.
Report a tweet for inappropriate language using the 'Report' feature.
Use 'Explore' tab to find trending memes.
Clear search history from settings.
Enable 'Data saver' mode in bandwidth settings.
Add a location pin to a tweet.
Opt out of personalized ads in privacy settings.
Request verification for my account.
Set up a Super Followers tier with exclusive content.
Use 'TweetDeck' to schedule a future tweet.
Add a location tag to a tweet I am posting.
Adjust notification settings to disable 'Recommendations' alerts.
Use advanced search to find tweets from @NASA containing 'Mars'.
Post a tweet with bold text using â€‹**asterisks**.
Create a private group chat with 3 users.
Export account analytics report for past 30 days.
Enable 'High contrast mode' in accessibility settings.
Switch to Japanese language interface.
Organize bookmarks into 'Tech' and 'Sports' folders.
Set up auto-reply for direct messages during offline hours.
Participate in a Twitter poll and verify vote registration.
Filter timeline to exclude retweets from @CNN.
Add 'spam' to muted words list in safety settings.
Co-author a tweet with another user via collaboration feature.
Change my account email address to a new one.
Opt out of political advertising targeting.
Set video playback quality to 720p in settings.
Search for tweets with the hashtag #TravelTuesday and like them.
Archive a Twitter Moment and verify hidden status.
Create a hashtag challenge with #30DayFitness.
Adjust audio settings for Spaces to mono output.
Curate 'Following' list by sorting chronologically.
Add a link to my website in my profile bio.
Filter home feed to show only verified accounts.
Set message requests to 'Verified users only'.
Check the analytics for my recent tweets.
Batch delete all drafts older than 30 days.
Configure 'Quiet hours' from 12 AM to 6 AM.
Use the search feature to find tweets about 'Tech News' from verified users.
Add 'Favorite' tweets to a dedicated collection.
Change default tweet font to Comic Sans.
Set up a custom notification for specific users' tweets.
Group hashtags into #ClimateAction category.
Create a 'List' to categorize the people I follow.
Reorder my following list based on activity level.
Enable 'Midnight' dark mode variant.

Set up a Twitter poll with 4 options for a question about which type of coffee blend people prefer: 'Espresso - based', 'Arabica', 'Robusta', or 'Decaf', to gather insights for my coffee - related blog.
Follow @NASA account and verify if 'Following' status appears.
Enable tweet translation feature for all incoming tweets.
Create a poll with multiple options for a weekend event decision.
Update the bio to include current job title and location.
Add a new pinned tweet to my profile.
Set my account to private.
Mute specific keyword 'AI' in my timeline for a week.
Find and follow 10 new accounts related to 'Photography'.
Start a Twitter Space and invite three followers to join.
Turn off the 'seen' status for direct messages.
Follow a trending hashtag and engage in the conversation.
Schedule a tweet to be posted tomorrow at 9 AM.
Block an account and report for spamming.
Explore the 'Discover' tab to find new trends in the beauty industry, specifically about natural and organic skincare products, and tweet about the most interesting findings.
Enable notifications for replies to my tweets.
Update my bio to reflect a new personal quote or achievement.
Unfollow an account that hasn't posted in over a month.
Turn on 'Sensitive Content' warning for my timeline.
Join a public Twitter Space discussion on current news.
Create a Twitter Moment by curating tweets around a specific event.
